text:
Hi everyone, I am Eugene and I am super excited to join this community (referred by <@U5TCAFTD3>). I am a designer-turn-engineer and have been design tools in the app building space, most recently at Palantir.

I've recently switched into research mode, thinking about how GenAI can help people, especially non-techies, build their own tools. I am writing and building prototypes around this idea and posting all these things here: <https://blog.eugenechantk.me/?tag=appbuilding>

I am just in awe that there is a community out here that is thinking and working on what I am passionate about. Love to chat or meet up if anyone is in SF
